item.title: Applications
item.description: The use of statistical and machine learning methods to analyze data, draw meaningful conclusions, and make informed decisions in diverse areas of applications.

item.title: Spatio-temporal Analysis
item.description: Statistical methods that analyze and interpret data that is collected not only over a period of time but also across a spatial domain. This involves analyzing spatial and temporal patterns and changes in the data over both space and time.

item.title: Time Series Analysis
item.description: An area of statistics that analyzes and interprets data collected or recorded over a period of time, in order to extract meaningful characteristics in time and forecast future values.
